body_html:
Installing precomputed version leads me to another error, problems with intel libraries. Trying to solve such problem I found the solution
conda install -c anaconda tensorflow-gpu

You can specify here version you want to install as well
body_text:
Installing precomputed version leads me to another error, problems with intel libraries. Trying to solve such problem I found the solution
conda install -c anaconda tensorflow-gpu 
You can specify here version you want to install as well
body:
Installing precomputed version leads me to another error, problems with intel libraries. Trying to solve such problem I found the solution
`
conda install -c anaconda tensorflow-gpu 
`

You can specify here version you want to install as well
